sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.LFConstants</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Constants common across  Localization framework.</description>
        <name>LFConstants</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var LFConstants = Class.create();
LFConstants.prototype = {

    initialize: function() {
        this.SUCCESS = "Success";
        this.PARTIAL = "Partial";
        this.ERROR = "Error";
        this.IN_PROGRESS = "In Progress";
        this.INFO_TYPE = "info";
        this.ERROR_TYPE = "error";

        this.DT_ERROR_CODES = [
            "40001", //Dynamic Translation plugin is not installed
            "40002", //No translation service is selected as the default translation service in the Translator Configurations
            "40003", //The passed in translator parameter is not a string
            "40004", //The specified translation service is not configured in the Translator Configuration
            "40005", //The specified translation service is not set to Active in the Translator 
            "40006", //Additional parameters are invalid
            "40007", //TargetLanguages parameter is passed in the call but is not valid
            "40008", //Source language field is invalid
            "40012", //translator is not configured for translation
            "40014", //Translator configuration version is invalid
            "40053", //Source language is invalid
            "40055" //Request is not authorized because credentials are missing or invalid
        ];

        this.WORKFLOWS = {
            "Translation_Publish": "translate_publish",
            "Translation_ApprovalOfTranslations_AutoPublish": "translate_tapproval_publish",
            "AutoTranslation_ApprovalOfTranslations_AutoPublish": "atranslate_tapproval_publish",
            "AutoTranslation_Publish": "atranslate_publish",
            "AutoTranslation_AutoPublish": "atranslate_apublish",
            "BusinessApproval_Translation_Publish": "bapproval_translate_publish",
            "BusinessApproval_Translation_ApprovalOfTranslations_AutoPublish": "bapproval_translate_tapproval_publish",
            "BusinessApproval_AutoTranslation_ApprovalOfTranslations_AutoPublish": "bapproval_atranslate_tapproval_publish",
            "BusinessApproval_AutoTranslation_Publish": "bapproval_atranslate_publish",
            "BusinessApproval_AutoTranslation_AutoPublish": "bapproval_atranslate_apublish"
        };

        this.TASK_STATES = {
            // Old states for backward compatibility
            'Awaiting_Business_Approval': 1,
            'Awaiting_Translation': 2,
            'Translation_In_Progress': 3,
            'Error_In_Translation': 4,
            'Translations_Approved': 5,
            'Awaiting_Translation_Approval': 6,
            'Closed_Complete': 7,
            'Error_In_Publishing_Translations': 8,
            'Closed_Incomplete': 9,

            // New States
            'Open': 10,
            'In_Progress': 11,
            'Under_Review': 12
        };

        this.REQUESTED_ITEM_STATES = {
            'Open': 1,
            'In_Progress': 2,
            'Closed_Complete': 3,
            'Closed_Incomplete': 4
        };

        this.REQUESTED_ITEM_STATUS = {
            'Translated': 1,
            'Partially_Translated': 2,
            'Not_Translated': 3
        };

        this.TRANSLATION_STATUS = {
            '1': gs.getMessage('Translated'),
            '2': gs.getMessage('Partially translated'),
            '3': gs.getMessage('Not translated')
        };

        this.PROJECT_STATES = {
            'Draft': 1,
            'In_Progress': 2,
            'Closed_Complete': 3,
            'Closed_Incomplete': 4
        };

        this.TASK_STATUS = {
            1: 'Open',
            2: 'Open',
            3: 'In Progress',
            4: 'In Progress',
            5: 'In Progress',
            6: 'In Progress',
            7: 'Closed Complete',
            8: 'Closed Incomplete',
            9: 'Closed Incomplete'
        };

        this.REQUESTED_ITEM_STATES_MAPPING = {
            1: 'Open',
            2: 'In Progress',
            3: 'Closed Complete',
            4: 'Closed Incomplete'
        };

        this.SETTING_KEYS = {
            "EnableMachineTranslate": "enable_machine_translate",
            "EnableTMS": "enable_tms",
            "EnableEmail": "enable_email",
            "EnableImportExport": "enable_export_import",
            "EnableEmailFormat": "email_format",
            "DefaultRecipientsList": "default_recipients_list",
            "ExportFormat": "export_format",
            "Workflow": "workflow",
            "LocalizationFulfillerGroup": "localization_fulfiller_group",
            "BusinessApproverGroup": "business_approver_group",
            "TranslationApproverGroup": "translation_approver_group",
            "TranslatorName": "translator_name",
            "TMSName": "tms_name",
            "TMSAdditionalInfo": "tms_additional_info",
            "EmailSubflowName": "email_subflow_name",
            "AutoTranslationMode": "auto_translation_mode",
            "Name": "name",
            "EnableProjects": "enable_projects",
            "EnableAutoCreation": "enable_auto_creation",
            "LocalizationManagerGroup": "localization_manager_group",
            "SysID": "sys_id"
        };

        this.AUTO_TRANSLATION_MODES = {
            "MachineTranslate": "machine_translate",
            "SendToTMS": "send_to_tms",
            "SendViaEmail": "send_via_email"
        };

        this.CSV_FILE_TYPE = 'csv';
        this.ZIP_FILE_TYPE = 'zip';
        this.CSV_CONTENT_TYPE = 'text/csv';
        this.XLIFF_CONTENT_TYPE = 'text/xml';
        this.ZIP_CONTENT_TYPE = 'application/zip';
        this.CSV_FILE_NAME = gs.getMessage('CSV');
        this.XLIFF_FILE_TYPE = 'xliff_1.2';
        this.XLIFF_FILE_EXTENSION = 'xliff';
        this.XLIFF_FILE_NAME = gs.getMessage('XLIFF 1.2');
        this.XLIFF_SOURCE_LANGUAGE = "source-language";
        this.XLIFF_TARGET_LANGUAGE = "target-language";
        this.XLIFF_ORIGINAL = "original";

        this.INSIGHTS_STATUS = {
            '1': gs.getMessage('completely translated'),
            '2': gs.getMessage('translation in progress'),
            '3': gs.getMessage('partially translated'),
            '4': gs.getMessage('not translated')
        };

        // Insights Constants
        this.INSIGHTS_REQUEST_TYPE = "insight";
        this.IN_PROGRESS_INSIGHTS_STATUS = 2;
        this.IN_PROGRESS_INSIGHTS_PERCENTAGE = -1;

        //Roles
        this.FULFILLER = "localization_fulfiller";
        this.REQUESTOR = "localization_requestor";
        this.ADMIN = "localization_admin";
        this.EDITOR = "localization_editor";
        this.FULFILLER_ROLE_SYS_ID = "1175b2ca533a101063a2ddeeff7b122a";
        this.MANAGER_ROLE_SYS_ID = "40cca8be77923010f853528069106139";


        // LUA
        this.MANUAL = "manual";
        this.AUTO = "auto";
        this.ADHOC = "adhoc";
        this.API = "api";
        this.TASK = "task";
        this.ERROR_LUA = "error";
        this.SUCCESS_LUA = "success";
    },

    type: 'LFConstants'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-01-18 14:00:44</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>4eea7619c3712010456b91f58640dd65</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>LFConstants</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Localization Framework" source="com.glide.localization_framework">be2124c92f241110d8a4d5f62799b640</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4eea7619c3712010456b91f58640dd65</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-01-31 07:13:26</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>6931</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
